===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[cruel]]; [[brutal]]; [[savage]]
#: {{zh-x|殘酷|cruel}}
# [[extremely]]; to an [[extreme]] [[degree]]
#: {{zh-x|酷愛|to have a passion for; to ardently love}}

====Usage notes====
Whilst English "cool" may be used in a wide variety of contexts, {{lang|zh|酷}} (and, by extension, {{zh-l|酷斃}}) is usually only used to describe something [[fashionable]] or [[extraordinary]].
